metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7098 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Race condition in wget 1.17 and earlier, when used in recursive ormirroring mode to download a single file, might allow remote servers tobypass intended access list restrictions by keeping an HTTP connectionopen.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wget package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3').
